name: Quantify Trading
description: Unlike traditional trading dashboards or social-trading platforms, our system is designed as a fully modular ecosystem, blending analytics, community, and automation. Key differentiators include: AI Agent marketplace: users can build and deploy custom trading algorithms and verify performance using ZK proofs. Social Lounge: an integrated feed combining trading posts, wallet tracking, and portfolio insights. Advanced portfolio analytics: cross-chain wallet insights with token holdings, PnL, and behavioral metrics. Privacy-first design: integrating cryptographic commitments and verifiable transparency while keeping user data and trading logic private. Seamless integration: live charts, simulated trading, and data aggregation in one unified interface.
